summary: Project is an app with content upload/admin capabilities; user needs an admin dashboard access flow.
architectural_notes: Decide/authenticate admin access via Internet Identity vs a custom PIN ("Security777") and define which governs dashboard visibility.
known_issues: Dashboard is not visible to the user after login, blocking content administration.

existing_features.title: Ensure the admin login code "Security777" grants admin access for the currently signed-in Internet Identity session, so the admin dashboard (Manage Videos view) becomes visible and accessible.

Make the dashboard discoverable by improving the post-admin-login UX: after successfully applying a valid admin token, automatically direct the user to the admin dashboard view (Manage Videos) and confirm access in the UI.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add an admin dashboard UI that is visible/accessible after login so admin can add/manage content.
Implement a login code/PIN flow using code "Security777" to unlock/admin-access the dashboard.
